Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

       The 3 Energonian crafts flew across the battle feild, raining down 
sharp blue energon laser blasts as they went. The Ark was a main target. 
Ominous hoped to take out the shields as soon as possible. Also the firepower 
was targeted at the enemy bots.
       "Alright, were going to send down Quasar. I want her to see if she 
cant impregnate the Ark." Ominous braodcasted to the other Energonians. "It 
shouldnt be difficult."
       He said this as she dropped out of the ship in a small, small, silver 
orb. It hit the surface of the moon and cracked open. She quickly made her 
way towrds the Ark.

       Tarantulas, Black Aracnia, and Quickstrike looked at the blue and red 
explosions of the battle as they came closer. The makeshift vessle wasnt 
armed, and had no shileds so they couldnt engage. It was going to be alot of 
footwork.
       "Now, once we exit the ship remember that the gravity of the moon is 
going to slow us down a bit. Just go to the Ark as fast as you can." 
Tarantulas said, as he laid the small vessle on the outskirts of the battle.
       The three bots got out, and went. Tarantulas went into vhicle mode and 
spedd off while Black Aracnia and Quickstrike scurried across in beast mode.

--part1_ee.10f1e2de.27b6b15d_boundary
